Carry and I sat outside and waited for around 20 minutes to get inside. There were still many waiting outside.Gessami: The white wine was recommended by the host here. It was pretty good for seafood.Sopa de Rap: delicious and thick soup for starter.Paella Parellada: the amount of it was really huge! Totally full after this. Very tasty, but be careful to save some space in your stomach for other foods!Graellada de Peix: Very fresh and yummy! Salty and pure taste is perfect for seafood.
